import React from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import "./practicingNon.css"; export default function PracticingNoMLS() { return (
{/* HERO */}

Practicing Real Estate

Keep your license active and work real estate the modern way. Use standardized brokerage forms, DocuSign, and a digital file review process—without being locked into association fees. When an MLS tool is required, simply partner with an MLS agent and share in the deal.

{/* QUICK VALUE GRID */}

Keep Your License Working

Represent buyers/sellers where MLS access isn’t needed, work new homes, leases, and relocation opportunities—while staying active with ARAD.

Standardized Forms

Handle offers, disclosures, and addenda with brokerage-approved templates and DocuSign. Clean, compliant files from start to finish.

Referral Income

Refer clients out locally or nationwide and get paid as procuring cause through a written acknowledgement—tracked by the brokerage.

{/* HOW IT WORKS + GET STARTED */}

How It Works

  1. Join ARAD and keep your license active (no MLS membership required).
  2. Use brokerage forms and DocuSign to open, write, and close your files.
  3. If a transaction needs MLS-only tools, partner with an MLS licensee and share in the work and compensation.
  4. For referrals, submit a short referral acknowledgement. ARAD marks you as the procuring cause and confirms with the receiving brokerage.
  5. After closing and reconciliation, commissions are sent via eCheck.
You’ll have brokerage-level compliance and support while avoiding recurring association dues on deals that don’t require MLS.

Get Started

Not sure whether to go non-MLS, referral-only, or partner-MLS? We’ll help you pick the right path for the clients you want to serve.

Join Now Ask a Question
{/* WHAT YOU CAN DO */}

What You Can Do

  • Sell new construction with on-site sales teams (co-op paid by builders).
  • Represent buyers/sellers on non-MLS inventory where permitted.
  • Work leases and corporate relocation opportunities.
  • Use brokerage standardized forms + DocuSign for all paperwork.
  • Earn referral fees across the U.S. through our partner network.
  • Partner locally with MLS agents when an MLS-only task is needed.
{/* WHAT REQUIRES AN MLS PARTNER */}

When You’ll Use an MLS Partner

  • Access to MLS data, private remarks, showing services, or lockboxes.
  • Listing property in the MLS as the listing brokerage.
  • Any task limited to association members by rule or vendor contract.
If an opportunity needs an MLS tool, loop in a partner MLS licensee. You keep your client relationship and share work/compensation by agreement.
{/* COMPLIANCE + PAYOUTS */}

Compliance & File Review

Agency, advertising, disclosures, and document retention follow Nevada rules and brokerage policy. Files are reviewed digitally—no paper drop-offs required.

Commission Payouts

After brokerage receipt of funds and reconciliation, payouts are issued via eCheck. Typical timelines are posted on our payouts page.

See Commission Payouts →
{/* CTA STRIP */}
Ready to practice real estate—without the overhead of MLS dues?
Join ARAD Talk to Us
); }
